page.title: 10Weekend
page.content: Our parents only work during the week so they can be with us at the weekend. On Saturday we often go into Rugby to shop or just look around.If it is fine we play outside with our friends.We like playing tennis.Saturday evening meal is usually chips and a salad in the Summer.We watch television in the evening before going to bed,later than usual as there is no school the next day.On Sunday our parents often take us to the Sports Centre to go swimming An Aquaslide opens there on 19th July 1985.This is a long slide that starts high up and winds round inside and outside the building ending in the swimming pool.It looks like a helter- skelter but it is covered in.We play outside in the afternoon.We always have a roast dinner on Sunday.Then we get ready for school on Monday.
